data.title: List of video game franchises
authors: Contributors to Ultimate Pop Culture Wiki
data.meta_description: This is a list of video game franchises organised alphabetically by name. This consists of long-running series as well as characters that have been portrayed in many games. This list does not include non-gaming intellectual properties that have been adapted for use in games (such as James Bond...

Additional franchises[]

This is a list of video game franchises organised alphabetically by name. This consists of long-running series as well as characters that have been portrayed in many games. This list does not include non-gaming intellectual properties that have been adapted for use in games (such as James Bond or sports leagues).
